verses.text: So \w the|strong="H5973"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* \w went|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w Queen|strong="H4436"\w* Esther.

\w As|strong="H5704"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w were|strong="H3117"\w* \w drinking|strong="H4960"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w again|strong="H8145"\w* said \w to|strong="H5704"\w* Esther, ‘\w Whatever|strong="H4100"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w petition|strong="H7596"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w*, \w Queen|strong="H4436"\w* Esther, \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H1571"\w* \w granted|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*. \w Whatever|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w request|strong="H1246"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H1571"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w*, \w even|strong="H1571"\w* if \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w takes|strong="H5414"\w* \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w*.’

\w Then|strong="H6030"\w* \w Queen|strong="H4436"\w* Esther \w answered|strong="H6030"\w*, ‘\w Your|strong="H5414"\w* Majesty, if \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* won \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w favour|strong="H2580"\w*, \w and|strong="H6030"\w* if \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w seems|strong="H5869"\w* \w best|strong="H5869"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w Your|strong="H5414"\w* Majesty, \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w be|strong="H5315"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w as|strong="H5315"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w petition|strong="H7596"\w*, \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w as|strong="H5315"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w request|strong="H1246"\w*,

\w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* \w been|strong="H5971"\w* \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H4428"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w*, \w killed|strong="H2026"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w completely|strong="H8045"\w* annihilated! \w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w been|strong="H5971"\w* merely \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* \w into|strong="H4376"\w* \w slavery|strong="H5650"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w would|strong="H5971"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* disturbed \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w peace|strong="H2790"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* such \w a|strong="H3068"\w* fate \w would|strong="H5971"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* affected \w the|strong="H3588"\w* interests \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.’

\w Then|strong="H2088"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* Ahasuerus \w said|strong="H3651"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w Queen|strong="H4436"\w* Esther, ‘\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w where|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w whose|strong="H4310"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w has|strong="H4310"\w* impelled \w him|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w*?’

‘\w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w foe|strong="H6862"\w*, \w an|strong="H6440"\w* \w enemy|strong="H6862"\w*: \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7451"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w*.’ Esther answered. \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* shrank \w in|strong="H4428"\w* terror \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w queen|strong="H4436"\w*.

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w rose|strong="H6965"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w place|strong="H5975"\w* \w where|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* \w drinking|strong="H4960"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w went|strong="H4428"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w palace|strong="H1055"\w* \w garden|strong="H1594"\w*. \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* \w stayed|strong="H5975"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w beg|strong="H1245"\w* \w Queen|strong="H4436"\w* Esther \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* \w fully|strong="H5921"\w* \w determined|strong="H3615"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w bring|strong="H7451"\w* \w calamity|strong="H7451"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w As|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w* \w garden|strong="H1594"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w banquet|strong="H4960"\w* \w hall|strong="H1004"\w*, \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* flung \w himself|strong="H6440"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* Esther’s \w couch|strong="H4296"\w*. \w The|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* cried, ‘\w Is|strong="H1571"\w* \w he|strong="H1004"\w* \w going|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w rape|strong="H3533"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w queen|strong="H4436"\w* \w while|strong="H5973"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* am \w present|strong="H5307"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w own|strong="H5973"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*?’ \w As|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1697"\w* \w these|strong="H6440"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* attendants \w covered|strong="H2645"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w*’s \w face|strong="H6440"\w*

\w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w Harbonah|strong="H2726"\w*, \w one|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w those|strong="H4480"\w* \w who|strong="H4428"\w* \w waited|strong="H5975"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, ‘\w There|strong="H2009"\w* \w are|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w gallows|strong="H6086"\w*, \w seventy-five|strong="H2572"\w* feet \w high|strong="H1364"\w*, \w which|strong="H1004"\w* Hainan \w erected|strong="H5975"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w*, \w who|strong="H4428"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w word|strong="H1696"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w behalf|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w standing|strong="H5975"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w*!’ \w The|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* ‘\w Hang|strong="H8518"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.’

\w So|strong="H5921"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w hanged|strong="H8518"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w gallows|strong="H6086"\w* \w that|strong="H4428"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w*. \w Then|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* \w pacified|strong="H7918"\w*.
